hero.title: Fuel Your Day with Fresh, Healthy Flavors!
hero.description: Discover our delicious, nutrient-packed lunch options made from the freshest ingredients. Order now for a meal that loves you back.

login.subheader: Log in to access your account, and start ordering!
login.title: Login

register.subheader: Sign up now to be part of our healthy eating community and get exclusive access to our latest recipes and offers!.
register.title: Register

dob.min: Date of birth cannot be that far in the past
dob.max: Date of birth cannot be in the future

password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password.max: Password must be less than 32 characters long
password.matches: Password must contain at least one digit, lowercase letter, uppercase letter, and a special character

success.title: Registration successful!
success.description: You have registered successfully!, please log in to continue.

sweetPotatoFries.title: Sweet Potato Fries
sweetPotatoFries.description: Baked sweet potato fries seasoned with sea salt.

hummusVeggiePlatter.title: Hummus & Veggie Platter
hummusVeggiePlatter.description: A variety of fresh vegetables served with homemade hummus.

stuffedMushrooms.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
stuffedMushrooms.description: Mushrooms stuffed with spinach and cheese.

avocadoBruschetta.title: Avocado Bruschetta
avocadoBruschetta.description: Grilled bread topped with avocado, cherry tomatoes, and basil.

bakedZucchiniSticks.title: Baked Zucchini Sticks
bakedZucchiniSticks.description: Crispy baked zucchini sticks served with marinara sauce.

falafelBalls.title: Falafel Balls
falafelBalls.description: Crispy falafel served with tahini sauce.

grilledChickenCaesarSalad.title: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
grilledChickenCaesarSalad.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with grilled chicken, parmesan cheese, and a light Caesar dressing.

quinoaAvocadoSalad.title: Quinoa & Avocado Salad
quinoaAvocadoSalad.description: Quinoa, avocado, black beans, and cherry tomatoes with lime vinaigrette.

kaleAppleSalad.title: Kale & Apple Salad
kaleAppleSalad.description: Fresh kale with crisp apples, walnuts, and a maple vinaigrette dressing.

greekSalad.title: Greek Salad
greekSalad.description: Cucumber, tomatoes, feta cheese, olives, and oregano with olive oil.

spinachBerrySalad.title: Spinach & Berry Salad
spinachBerrySalad.description: Fresh spinach with mixed berries, almonds, and a poppy seed dressing.

chickpeaAvocadoSalad.title: Chickpea & Avocado Salad
chickpeaAvocadoSalad.description: Chickpeas, avocado, and red onion with lemon-tahini dressing.

citrusArugulaSalad.title: Citrus & Arugula Salad
citrusArugulaSalad.description: Arugula topped with fresh citrus segments and toasted pine nuts.

warmQuinoaKaleSalad.title: Warm Quinoa & Kale Salad
warmQuinoaKaleSalad.description: Warm quinoa with roasted butternut squash, kale, and cranberries.

veganSaladSmoothieDeal.title: Vegan Salad & Smoothie Deal
veganSaladSmoothieDeal.description: A fresh garden salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, quinoa, and a lemon-tahini dressing, served with a tropical mango smoothie. Perfect for a light and healthy meal.

grilledSalmonWithVeggies.title: Grilled Salmon with Veggies
grilledSalmonWithVeggies.description: Grilled salmon fillet with steamed vegetables.

grilledTofuStirFry.title: Grilled Tofu Stir-Fry
grilledTofuStirFry.description: Stir-fried vegetables with grilled tofu and a savory ginger-soy sauce.

chickenStirFry.title: Chicken Stir Fry
chickenStirFry.description: Stir-fried chicken with mixed vegetables in soy sauce.

zucchiniNoodlesWithPesto.title: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
zucchiniNoodlesWithPesto.description: Zucchini noodles tossed in fresh basil pesto.

turkeyLettuceSandwich.title: Turkey Lettuce Sandwich
turkeyLettuceSandwich.description: Ground turkey with lettuce wraps and a light sauce sandwich.

grilledTofuSkewers.title: Grilled Tofu Skewers
grilledTofuSkewers.description: Tofu skewers marinated in herbs, served with grilled veggies.

eggplantParmesan.title: Eggplant Parmesan
eggplantParmesan.description: Baked eggplant layered with marinara sauce and melted cheese.

beefBroccoliStirFry.title: Beef & Broccoli Stir-Fry
beefBroccoliStirFry.description: Tender beef and broccoli stir-fried in soy-ginger sauce.

burritoBowl.title: Burrito Bowl
burritoBowl.description: A burrito bowl filled with rice, beans, and veggies, and chicken.

lambShawarmaPlate.title: Lamb Shawarma Plate
lambShawarmaPlate.description: Tender lamb shawarma with rice and salad.

chickenWrapCombo.title: Chicken Wrap Combo
chickenWrapCombo.description: A whole wheat chicken wrap filled with grilled chicken, avocado, lettuce, and a light yogurt sauce. Comes with a side of sweet potato fries and a refreshing drink.

grilledSalmonPowerPlate.title: Grilled Salmon Power Plate
grilledSalmonPowerPlate.description: A protein-packed meal including grilled salmon, roasted veggies, and brown rice, paired with a detox green juice for a balanced and nutritious offering.

chiaPudding.title: Chia Pudding
chiaPudding.description: Chia seeds soaked in almond milk with mixed berries.

fruitSaladWithHoney.title: Fruit Salad with Honey
fruitSaladWithHoney.description: A mix of seasonal fruits drizzled with honey.

bananaOatCookies.title: Banana Oat Cookies
bananaOatCookies.description: Healthy cookies made with oats, banana, and dark chocolate chips.

avocadoBrownies.title: Avocado Brownies
avocadoBrownies.description: Rich brownies made with avocado and dark chocolate.
